roleset.name: to make a pet of, fondle, pamper into tame resignation

example.name: Descriptive usage
example.text: It was far too early for other questions -- about a force cosseted *none* at the end of vulnerable supply lines...
example.arg: at the end of vulnerable supply lines

example.name: Descriptive usage
example.text: It must be wonderful to live a protected, cosseted life.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'pamper' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No Verbnet entry. No comparison.
